p: Herbal medicine has been used throughout history and thus recognized as the oldest form of healthcare known to humanity [ 6]. The World Health Organization supports its use and regards it as one of the most effective strategies towards conquering the emerging diseases. It is considered one of the world's surest means of achieving total health since it is more affordable compared to conventional medicine [ 7]. Approximately 80% of the world's population relies on traditional medicine for their primary healthcare needs (WHO, 2015). The reliance on herbal medicine is mainly attributed to factors such as affordability, availability, and accessibility [ 8]. The use of medicinal plants is also integrated to most African culture and thus more acceptable than conventional medicine [ 9].
